title: Chan Min Min
text:
Data Scientist. Machine Learning and AI Enthusiast.
I am Min Min, a data scientist with a keen interest in data science and machine learning techniques. I graduated with a bachelor in Physics and masters in Statistics from the National University of Singapore. I have experience in data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling. I am passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and to make data-driven decisions. I am proficient in R, Python, and SQL. I am also familiar with machine learning techniques and applied machine learning algorithms for predictive analytics. I am currently working as a data scientist in a startup company.
My interests in data science and machine learning are broad, and I am always looking for opportunities to learn and grow. I am open to collaborations and new projects. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential collaborations.

title: Random Snippets About Me
text:
Hobbies
My time is mostly occupied tending to my two children. However, if I have free time, I enjoy:

Playing the piano
Reading
Sleeping



Learning Plans
I love to acquire new knowledge. In this season, I am planning to learn the following skills, in order of priority.

Deep Learning
Guitar
Cooking

If you want to learn guitar, follow this youtube channel:

For me, learning how to cook is more of a necessity to eat healthily than a passion, more like how water H2O is a necessity for life.
Albert Einstein is best known for his equation E = mc2 which states that energy and mass are the same thing. He is also an avid learner and has a quote that resonates with me:

Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.

title: About
text:
I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence and loves to learn how to safely and effectively use it to help people.
I am constantly learning to keep up with the rapid pace of change in the field of AI. This also helps to develop relevant skills for technical work.



National University of Singapore







I completed my Master of Science in Statistics at National University of Singapore.
